TopicTitle: What is the angle for an optimal Jool Transfer?

Articles.Content:
I'm trying to set up mining/refueling bases on all planets, laying the infrastructure for a standardized, high-utility, infinite range craft. I have Duna, Kerbin, Minmus, and The Mun (with a KerbNet relay around the sun for angle visual from Kerbin to Duna). 

Next up is Jool. I know it moves pretty slow, but what is the angle for a low-deltaV transfer?

-a user that got his first duna landing 3 days ago

http://alexmoon.github.io/ksp/

Check out that website.

Also, welcome to the KSP forums @JustAnotherJebFan!
